00049 <script type="text/javascript">
00053 var changeDateForm = function(intLoanID, strDateToChange, strDateElementID)
00054 {
00055     var dateElement = $(strDateElementID);
00056     var dateElementVal = dateElement.innerHTML.strip();
00057     var inputDate = 'input' + strDateElementID;
00058     var inputDateElement = '<input type="text" value="' + dateElementVal + '" name="' + inputDate + '" id="' + inputDate + '" maxlength="10" size="10" />';
00059     dateElement.insert({before: inputDateElement}).hide();
00060     $(inputDate).focus();
00061     // utility function as an Event listener
00062     var changeListener = {
00063         changed: function(event) {
00064             var inputDate = Event.element(event);
00065             changeLoanDate(intLoanID, strDateToChange, strDateElementID, inputDate.getValue());
00066         }
00067     }
00068     var evtListener = changeListener.changed.bindAsEventListener(changeListener);
00069     $(inputDate).observe('blur', evtListener);
00070 }
00071 
00075 var changeLoanDate = function(intLoanID, strDateToChange, strDateElementID, strDate)
00076 {
00077     var dateData = {newLoanDate: strDate, loanSessionID: intLoanID};
00078     var dateElement = $(strDateElementID);
00079     if (strDateToChange == 'due') {
00080         dateData = {newDueDate: strDate, loanSessionID: intLoanID};
00081     }
00082     var ajaxJSON = new Ajax.Request('<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'circulation/loan_date_AJAX_change.php'; ?>', {
00083         method: 'post',
00084         parameters: dateData,
00085         onSuccess: function(ajaxTransport) {
00086                 // get AJAX response text
00087                 var respText = ajaxTransport.responseText.strip();
00088                 if (!respText) {
00089                     return;
00090                 }
00091                 noResult = false;
00092                 // evaluate json respons
00093                 var sessionDate = respText.evalJSON();
00094                 // update date element
00095                 dateElement.update(sessionDate.newDate);
00096             }
00097         });
00098     // remove input date
00099     $('input' + strDateElementID).remove();
00100     dateElement.show();
00101 }
00102 </script>

00122     <?php
00123     // make a list of temporary loan if there is any
00124     if (count($_SESSION['temp_loan']) > 0) {
00125         // create table object
00126         $temp_loan_list = new simbio_table();
00127         $temp_loan_list->table_attr = "align='center' style='width: 100%;' cellpadding='3' cellspacing='0'";
00128         $temp_loan_list->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00129         $temp_loan_list->highlight_row = true;
00130         // table header
00131         $headers = array(__('Remove'),  __('Item Code'), __('Title'), __('Loan Date'), __('Due Date'));
00132         $temp_loan_list->setHeader($headers);
00133         // row number init
00134         $row = 1;
00135         foreach ($_SESSION['temp_loan'] as $_loan_ID => $temp_loan_list_d) {
00136             // alternate the row color
00137             $row_class = ($row%2 == 0)?'alterCell':'alterCell2';
00138 
00139             // remove link
00140             $remove_link = '<a href="circulation_action.php?removeID='.$temp_loan_list_d['item_code'].'" title="Remove this item" class="trashLink">&nbsp;</a>';
00141 
00142             // check if manually changes loan and due date allowed
00143             if ($sysconf['allow_loan_date_change']) {
00144                 $loan_date = '<a href="#" title="'.__('Click To Change Loan Date').'" onclick="changeDateForm(\''.$_loan_ID.'\', \'loan\', \'loanDate'.$row.'\')" id="loanDate'.$row.'">'.$temp_loan_list_d['loan_date'].'</a>';
00145                 $due_date = '<a href="#" title="'.__('Click To Change Due Date').'" onclick="changeDateForm(\''.$_loan_ID.'\', \'due\', \'dueDate'.$row.'\')" id="dueDate'.$row.'">'.$temp_loan_list_d['due_date'].'</a>';
00146             } else {
00147                 $loan_date = $temp_loan_list_d['loan_date'];
00148                 $due_date = $temp_loan_list_d['due_date'];
00149             }
00150 
00151             // row colums array
00152             $fields = array(
00153                 $remove_link, $temp_loan_list_d['item_code'],
00154                 $temp_loan_list_d['title'], $loan_date, $due_date);
00155 
00156             // append data to table row
00157             $temp_loan_list->appendTableRow($fields);
00158             // set the HTML attributes
00159             $temp_loan_list->setCellAttr($row, null, "valign='top' class='$row_class'");
00160             $temp_loan_list->setCellAttr($row, 0, "valign='top' align='center' class='$row_class' style='width: 5%;'");
00161             $temp_loan_list->setCellAttr($row, 1, "valign='top' class='$row_class' style='width: 10%;'");
00162             $temp_loan_list->setCellAttr($row, 2, "valign='top' class='$row_class' style='width: 60%;'");
00163 
00164             $row++;
00165         }
00166

00168     }

00170 }
